verses.name: Leviticus 7:5
verses.text: And the priest shall burn them upon the altar for an offering made by fire unto the Lord: it is a trespass offering.

verses.name: Leviticus 7:6
verses.text: Every male among the priests shall eat thereof: it shall be eaten in the holy place: it is most holy.

verses.name: Leviticus 7:7
verses.text: As the sin offering is, so is the trespass offering: there is one law for them: the priest that maketh atonement therewith shall have it.

verses.name: Leviticus 7:8
verses.text: And the priest that offereth any man’s burnt offering, even the priest shall have to himself the skin of the burnt offering which he hath offered.
